item.title: Visible Setup
item.description: Citable Author Martin John Hadley (orcid.org/0000-0002-3039-6849) Citable Data No data used. Citable Code .Rmd on GitHub After a long time coming, I’ve finally got round to picking a workable solution for creating my data blog “Visible Data”. This is a short overview of how I picked my tools and my intentions for the website.
